entities.description: The number of different kinds of other activities, such as dance lessons, piano lessons, karate lessons, or horseback riding lessons, in which the respondent participated in the past 12 months.
Indicator of whether the respondent had a special class about drugs or alcohol in school in the past 12 months.
Indicator of whether the respondent had films, lectures, discussions, or printed information about drugs or alcohol in a regular school class in the past 12 months.

Indicator of whether the respondent had films, lectures, discussions, or printed information about drugs or alcohol outside of regular school classes, such as in a special assembly, in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the number of other activities the respondent participated in during the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent attended a special class about drugs or alcohol in school during the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent had films, lectures, discussions, or printed information about drugs or alcohol in a regular class during the past 12 months.
Indicates whether the respondent had films, lectures, discussions, or printed information about drugs or alcohol outside of regular classes in the past 12 months.
